text: Kamavata Jisas sɨhinda ambami, Kandɨtɨwɨmi hañɨ Gotɨndu tɨwɨyɨ kɨyɨhɨyɨha, navundi ñaŋɨra kumanzɨpi timutamu tɨŋgɨruramɨvatɨndu vana maña kɨyɨmandɨ. Kru mumɨŋga navundi urɨrɨm andɨmi mɨŋga parɨm andɨmi. Kamatɨhi navundi ñaŋɨra kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋ umbimbuŋgɨ nurɨŋandɨ haŋɨnɨŋ mɨŋata, kru kandɨhamaŋ kɨndɨñɨ ŋgata tɨmbuta payɨm vata umu.
